channel.title: How to make your players have an xp rate (1200xp a hit for example)
channel.description: Okay, I downloaded a blank source with 100% nothing on it, Ive been coding it for about 30 mins when i got bored and wanted to attack something... and i couldnt hit a single number and i attacked a lvl 2 man for like 5 mins not kidding. So i want to know how to hurt monsters and how to make an xp rate

item.title: How to make your players have an xp rate (1200xp a hit for example)
item.dc:creator: @darkboe_pkz darkboe pkz
item.description:
@darkboe_pkz wrote:

serch for sumthing that lloks like this
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(4000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
and were it says 4000 on mine change urs to what u want it to thers about 10 of those codes so change them all to the exp rate u want

Read full topic
